name: @atos-virtual-care/vcs-realtime-sdk-web-demo
description: Example app for vcs-realtime-sdk with vuejs
author: roger.urscheler@atos.net

scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install --force
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm start
scripts.deploy:gcp: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:frontend && gcloud app deploy --quiet
